description:
Colombia’s war crimes tribunal JEP assumed all pending criminal investigations against demobilized paramilitary commander Salvatore Mancuso. The JEP ruling sidelines the transitional Justice and Peace system, which was set up…

title: Colombia’s war crimes tribunal assumes all investigations against former AUC commander

description:
Defense Minister Ivan Velasquez suspended a ceasefire with dissident FARC guerrilla group EMC in southwest Colombia on Sunday. The president ordered the military to resume attacks on the EMC in…

title: Colombia partially suspends ceasefire with dissident FARC guerrillas
